languages.text: {n}{petname} взирает на вас молча, выпрямившись на насесте во весь свой рост, а затем распахивает крылья, словно пытаясь стать больше в ваших глазах. Похоже, исполненное достоинства молчание должно демонстрировать мрачное уважение, которым преисполнены подданые к Вольному Торговцу.{/n}

{n}{petname} looks at you without making a sound and straightens up. Then, the bird spreads its wings as if trying to appear larger. Presumably, this dignified silence is supposed to demonstrate the grim respect that your subjects have for their Rogue Trader.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}{petname} взирает на вас молча, выпрямившись на насесте во весь свой рост, а затем распахивает крылья, словно пытаясь стать больше в ваших глазах. Похоже, исполненное достоинства молчание должно демонстрировать мрачное уважение, которым преисполнены подданые к Вольному Торговцу.{/n}

languages.text: {n}{petname}は静かにあなたを見つめながら、姿勢を正した。すると鳥は、自分をより大きく見せようとするかのように翼を広げた。おそらく、この荘厳な沈黙は、あなたの臣民たちがローグトレーダーに抱く厳粛な敬意を示すためのものなのだろう。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}{petname} looks at you without making a sound and straightens up. Then, the bird spreads its wings as if trying to appear larger. Presumably, this dignified silence is supposed to demonstrate the grim respect that your subjects have for their Rogue Trader.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}{petname}は静かにあなたを見つめながら、姿勢を正した。すると鳥は、自分をより大きく見せようとするかのように翼を広げた。おそらく、この荘厳な沈黙は、あなたの臣民たちがローグトレーダーに抱く厳粛な敬意を示すためのものなのだろう。{/n}

languages.text: {n}{petname} sieht dich an, ohne ein Geräusch zu machen, und richtet sich auf. Dann breitet der Vogel die Flügel aus, als versuche er, größer zu erscheinen. Vermutlich soll dieses würdevolle Schweigen den Respekt demonstrieren, den deine Untertanen {mf|ihrem Freihändler|ihrer Freihändlerin} entgegenbringen.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}{petname} looks at you without making a sound and straightens up. Then, the bird spreads its wings as if trying to appear larger. Presumably, this dignified silence is supposed to demonstrate the grim respect that your subjects have for their Rogue Trader.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}{petname} sieht dich an, ohne ein Geräusch zu machen, und richtet sich auf. Dann breitet der Vogel die Flügel aus, als versuche er, größer zu erscheinen. Vermutlich soll dieses würdevolle Schweigen den Respekt demonstrieren, den deine Untertanen {mf|ihrem Freihändler|ihrer Freihändlerin} entgegenbringen.{/n}

languages.text: {n}{petname} vous observe silencieusement et se redresse. La corneille entreprend ensuite d'étendre ses ailes afin d'afficher une posture intimidante. Il semblerait que ce silence digne vise à évoquer le respect indéfectible de vos sujets envers leur {mf|libre-marchand|libre-marchande}.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}{petname} looks at you without making a sound and straightens up. Then, the bird spreads its wings as if trying to appear larger. Presumably, this dignified silence is supposed to demonstrate the grim respect that your subjects have for their Rogue Trader.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}{petname} vous observe silencieusement et se redresse. La corneille entreprend ensuite d'étendre ses ailes afin d'afficher une posture intimidante. Il semblerait que ce silence digne vise à évoquer le respect indéfectible de vos sujets envers leur {mf|libre-marchand|libre-marchande}.{/n}

languages.text: {n}{petname} te mira sin hacer ruido y se endereza. Luego el ave extiende las alas como queriendo aparentar que es más grande. Cabe suponer que su decoroso silencio representa el respeto reverencial que profesan tus súbditos a su Comerciante Independiente.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}{petname} looks at you without making a sound and straightens up. Then, the bird spreads its wings as if trying to appear larger. Presumably, this dignified silence is supposed to demonstrate the grim respect that your subjects have for their Rogue Trader.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}{petname} te mira sin hacer ruido y se endereza. Luego el ave extiende las alas como queriendo aparentar que es más grande. Cabe suponer que su decoroso silencio representa el respeto reverencial que profesan tus súbditos a su Comerciante Independiente.{/n}

languages.text: {n}{petname}看着你，没有发出任何声音，仅仅挺直了身躯。随后，它张开双翼，似乎想让自己看起来更大一样。或许，它庄严的沉默是为了传达你的臣民对你的尊重与敬畏。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}{petname} looks at you without making a sound and straightens up. Then, the bird spreads its wings as if trying to appear larger. Presumably, this dignified silence is supposed to demonstrate the grim respect that your subjects have for their Rogue Trader.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}{petname}看着你，没有发出任何声音，仅仅挺直了身躯。随后，它张开双翼，似乎想让自己看起来更大一样。或许，它庄严的沉默是为了传达你的臣民对你的尊重与敬畏。{/n}

languages.text: {n}{petname} sana çıtını çıkarmadan bakıp yerinde doğruluyor. Ardından daha büyük görünmeye çalışırcasına kanatlarını açıyor. Muhtemelen bu oturaklı sessizliğinin altında, tebaanın Hür Tacir'e olan saygısının tasviri yatıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}{petname} looks at you without making a sound and straightens up. Then, the bird spreads its wings as if trying to appear larger. Presumably, this dignified silence is supposed to demonstrate the grim respect that your subjects have for their Rogue Trader.{/n}
